content:
# The attempt to harvest coal resulted in an error stating "Nothing within reach to harvest." 
# This indicates that the player character is either too far from the resource or there may be a limitation in the harvesting mechanics.

# Given the situation, I will check my current position to ensure that I am indeed near the coal patch and not mistakenly far away. 
# I will use the `get_position()` command to confirm my current coordinates.

current_position = get_position()  # Get the current position of the player character
print(current_position)  # Output the current position to verify proximity to the coal patch.
